name: Who. Are. You.
description:
This project was created as part of a Bachelor Project developed at the UE - University of Europe for Applied Sciences // Game Design.

The project is an experimentation with character creation. Players are able to witness and partake in the conception of the backstory of a would-be protagonist.

Key features:

  • Experience an introspective journey as a character dives into the question of what defines them
  • Select traits that make the character who they are
  • Choose which traits to approach defining moments in the character's life with and thus partake in writing their past

Credits:
Supervised by: Sebastian Stamm, Jiré Emine Gözen

(Summer Semester 2022)

Sensatype Studio: "Rosemary" (Font)
Forkssrose: "Schoolwork" (Font)Avionx: "Skybox Series Free - 6SidedCosmicCoolCloud" (Skybox Asset)
